Articles.Content: So I play modded ksp and my favorite mod suite is final frontier. The mod pack is a TP mod where your kerbals earn certain ribbons and awards for accomplishing great feats such as being to the lethal to reach orbit. My problem I’ve been having is even since my ckan data erased I cannot reinstall any addon to the mod and can only install the mod core. I cannot use old beta on steam because the mod adding are made to run 1.4.3 and for some reason your not able to use that beta on steam. I was wondering if anyone knows about a possible update for the mod or if anyone knows how to update it. Please get back to me thanks.

Modded support question moved to the modded support subforum. 

And good luck with your issue.

How about asking in the actual mod thread for Final Frontier?

I'm also not sure I can parse your question.  Could you try to rephrase what you're trying to achieve and what your problem is?

I think you are looking for a version of FF that runs on an older version of KSP? 

If your issue is with CKAN, then I'd ask in that thread about getting it fixed, but CKAN should only install the mod version compatible with your version of KSP.
